title: Vidal Sassoon Scroll Headbands, 2 Count
description: A delicate scroll design covers these thick plastic headbands. The headbands are flexible so they will fit almost any size head. Small nubs help hold the headband in place. One size fits most, the headbands flex to fit your head. Package includes 2 headbands- 1 tortoise and 1 black.

title: NOW Foods Clary Sage Oil, 1 ounce
description: Aroma:  Herbaceous, lavender-like.  Benefits:  Focusing, stimulating, balancing.

title: Colorescience Sunforgettable Eyescreen SPF 30
description: Colorescience Sunforgettable Eyescreen mineral powder is designed to disguise dark circles and fine lines while offering SPF 30 protection against UVA and UVB damage. Featuring a soft pink hue, it brightens and illuminates the entire eye area, resulting in a more youthful appearance. The long-lasting formula promises exceptional protection against UV damage, even after up to 80 minutes of activity in water. Application brush included.Paraben-Free

title: Auric Blends Perfume Oil, 0.33 oz - Coco Mango
description: A fruity, tropical blend of sweet coconut and exotic mango.  Fresh, summery and fun.

title: Olay Professional Pro-X Hydra Firming Cream Anti Aging 1.7 Oz
description: Pro-X Hydra Firming Cream is professionally designed as a primary solution that helps optimize elasticity and firmness by plumping and locking in moisture. And as with all Pro-X products, it has been designed and tested to resignal skin to perform more like it did when it was younger. And younger-acting skin means younger-looking skin. Olay Professional Pro-X skin care products are a scientifically advanced line created by an inspired partnership of renowned dermatologists and P&G; Beauty Scientists. Together they took advantage of the very latest research, technology, ingredients, and thinking to create breakthrough anti-aging Pro-X products. Pro-X works by resignaling your skin to repair the moisture barrier and boost the surface-cell turnover rate. So you get younger-acting, younger-looking skin.

title: The Body Shop Tea Tree Face Mask, 3.85 Ounce
description: Leave your skin feeling deeply clean and refreshed with this instantly cooling mask. Our Tea Tree Face Mask helps remove impurities and absorb excess oil while soothing and calming blemish-prone skin. Our Tea tree range contains Lemon tea tree and Community Trade Tea tree oil which fight blemishes and help prevent new ones from forming. Tamanu oil has a soothing effect and helps to calm irritation and redness.

title: Physicians Formula Bronze Booster Glow-Enhancing Pressed Shimmer Bronzer, Light to Medium
description: Bronze Booster Glow-Boosting Pressed Shimmer BronzerDescription * Ultra-luxurious shimmery bronzing powder provides an instant and lasting shimmery bronze glow! * Exclusive concentrated bronzing micropearls deliver an ultra-shimmery, glamorous sunkissed glow. * Formulated with Glow Activators Technology to provide Triple-Action Bronze Boosting that helps enhance and extend the life of your tan glow and improve skin's clarity and radiance. * Sliding bronzer brush and mirror included. Hypoallergenic. Fragrance Free. Paraben Free. Dermatologist Approved. Non-Comedogenic. Oil-Free.

title: Over the Cabinet Door Chrome Folding Hair Dryer Holder Caddy
description:
Keep organized with this folding hair dryer holder that hangs right over a cabinet door! This clever space saver provides a convenient way of storing your hair dryer. Folds flat for easy storage when not in use.  A must have for bathroom storage and organization!
Compact folding design.
Measures 7" Long  x 4.5" Wide at widest point. Hangs over standard cabinet doors. Hanging hook measures 1" Deep.

title: Babyface Night Renewal Cream 2% Encapsulated Retinol (1,700,000 IU/g) Non-Irritating Retinol OTC for Skin Tone Correction, Resurfacing, Anti-Aging, Acne
description:
2% Pure Retinol (Encapsulated for controlled release and stability). Strongest OTC strength Retinol Available.Why is Encapsulated Retinol better? Encapsulated Retinol releases a little at a time, benefiting the skin, but not shocking it into inflamed irritation. 
Encapsulation also preserves the potency of the Retinol molecule, ensuring it remains effective long term.Babyface's Night Renewal Cream is gentle, yet effective. With a strong potency (1700000 IU/g) it will get the job done, but without irritating like other products can. Best for those who have not used prescription retinoids before, or for those who prefer to achieve some of the same benefits, but without the irritation. Our effective formula was created to be a practical product that you can use daily. While not as fast acting as a prescription cream, the retinol in Night Renewal Creme is converted to retinoic acid slower and therefore there is little or no irritation. Compared to Retin-A, which usually produces results in about 4-8 weeks, the Night Renewal Creme is around 12 weeks.2% concentration of retinol (and 1700000 IU/g). Packaged in a light protected, airless jar for ease of use and to ensure freshness and effectiveness.Babyface Night Renewal Crme is a great option to harsher prescription products, and can also improve lines and discoloration, or be used as an acne treatment. Our retinol cream is gradually converted into retinoic acid (the active ingredient in the prescription creams) and results are seen at around 12 weeks for most people. Some will respond very quickly, but we do suggest giving it 3 months for real results.When using Retinol for treating hair loss, it is recommended to use it in combination with Minoxidil, as it's believed that Retinol boosts the penetration and effectiveness of the Minoxidil topical treatments.Cautions: Don't use vitamin A products if you are pregnant or breastfeeding.
